title: whatspopping
author: whatspopping
content: How does it work? How do you share it? Before I start looking to choose where to make one, I would like to know about the ways of sharing it and which one worked best for you?Thanks!

comments.author: whatspopping
comments.body: Thanks for the practical examples, I have a much clearer of picture how to proceed now!Cheers!

comments.author: lolita24
comments.body: Social media platforms like LinkedIn allow you to create a digital business card and share it with your connections. + There are various apps available that allow you to create and share digital business cards. Some popular ones include CamCard, Haystack, and Inigo.
